shots.query: Subjects received one tablet twice daily in accordance with dosage recommended by the German Commission E (Blumenthal and Busse, 1998).

Since the clinical therapeutic dosage of warfarin in common use was 1–2 mg/day for a person, the equivalent rats dosage was calculated to be 0.2 mg/kg (human equivalent dosage in rat = human dosage/60 kg × 6.2), once daily [38].
plus placebo once daily Placebo, placebo b.i.d.
For clinical study, healthy human volunteers received a single dose of DEX alone (phase-I) and repeated the same dose after a washout period and four-day Asafetida treatment (phase-II).
The clinical use of gliclazide is initiated at 40 mg daily and may increase up to 320 mg daily in divided doses.
